alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Stearns County through 400 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holdingford, or 21 miles southwest of Little Falls, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. Anthony and Holdingford around 320 PM CDT. Albany around 330 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Avon, Collegeville and St. Joseph. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 144 and 162. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
